room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape This Live: Columbus in Columbus (GA)
room_description:
Your friend, Chloe Thomas, is a journalism student at Columbus State University. She is doing a documentary on the Mulberry Grove Asylum. This asylum was closed down in the 70's because all the patients of Dr. Klein mysteriously died. The asylum is rumored to be haunted.
The night Chloe went to the asylum, you received a picture of her inside with a very strange message written on the wall behind her. You have not heard from her since. You decide to investigate her disappearance yourself, using the message Chloe left as the first lead. Can you solve the mystery of the Mulberry Grove Asylum and the fate of Dr. Klein's patients before it's too late?
